# Tracking Crimson Bullet

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Shinjutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short, Mid, Long
- Users: Kawaki
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game

## Summary
Kawaki uses his KƒÅma to gather chakra to fire blasts of red energy. Unlike the beam variation, these blasts are not normally lethal and use less chakra.

## Notes
- * In the games, Kawaki can shape the red energy into a sphere, reminiscent to the Rasengan, for cooperation ninjutsu with Boruto and Naruto.
